backtestingMainKC module

backtestingMainKC.retrives_cerebro_with_data(data_args: dict) -> (<class 'backtrader.cerebro.Cerebro'>, <class 'list'>)

Retrieves data and creates a cerebro instance.

Args: - data_args (dict): Dictionary containing data-related arguments

Returns: - bt.Cerebro: Cerebro instance - list: List of data analysis

backtestingMainKC.set_cerebro(cerebro: Cerebro, data_args: dict) → None

Sets up the cerebro with strategies and parameters.

Args: - cerebro (bt.Cerebro): Cerebro instance - data_args (dict): Dictionary containing data-related arguments

Returns: - None
